page.title: 14RECREATION
page.content: It is said that if you go to the highest point in Law you can see seven counties. They are Clackmananshire, Ayrshire,Lanarkshire,Renfrewshire, Dunbartonshire,West Lothian and Stirlingshire. There is a bowling green,a running track and three playing areas.Snooker and pool are available at tha Masonic Hall.Law has one public bar and an hotel. There is a Community Centre. Its sports include badminton,hockey,pool, snooker,netball,table tennis,darts and roller skating.There is also a Welfare Hall offering football,karate, boxing and most of the sports they play at the Community Centre. There are 3 Uniformed Organisations, Girls'Brigade,Boys' Brigade and Brownies.Law has its own flute band, The Pride of Law Covenanters.
